original_text: The two men went into the village. They saw everything there that Jesus had told them about.
korean_text: 보내심을 받은 자들이 가서 그 말씀하신 대로 만난지라

sentences.original_text: The two men went into the village

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 거기에 있는 모든 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: that Jesus had told them about
